Package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management

Provides the classes necessary to query the database in order to manipulate elements in the database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MenuManager
    The MenuManager class connects to the database via its constructor.
    OrderManager
    The Order Manager class connects to the database via its constructor.
    SearchManager
    The SearchManager class connects to the database via its constructor.
    SqliteConnection
    This class sets up a connection to the database attached in the source folder: (RestaurantBillingSystem.db).
    StaffManager
    The StaffManager class connects to the database via its constructor.
    TableManager
    The TableManager class connects to the database via its constructor.

Package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management Description

Provides the classes necessary to query the database in order to manipulate elements in the database. The different classes query different sections of the database and can retrieve,update or delete data. All classes connect to the database via their controllers and the SqliteConnection class.

Author:
Miguel Marin Vermelho
